Christmas is just around the corner, and other than staying home and enjoying the good weather in L.A. , we don't have any travel plans . . . yet. How about you? Forget about all the Holiday to-do lists and how busy the holidays can get, I always feel happy when I put on this velvet embellished dress from @ted_baker . Loving all the bows and sparkles on my shoes and bag, too, and looking forward to some good holiday times --who is with me? 🖤🌟#TedtoToe #SCPStyle #sponsored

Happy Black Friday! 🖤Well, this is the time of year shoppers wait for again, and I have heard many of my friends going to visit the mall as early as 6am today –how about you?

I am never a Black Friday mall shopping girl — but I still want the good deals, so I would rather just stay home in my pajamas with hot cocoa ☕️and browse all the good sales online. 👩🏻‍💻
This look on Halliedaily.com today, we also gathered all the great designer sales in one place! 🧨📌

Happy Thanksgiving! We’re spending the holiday and the rest of the week with a lot of food and laughter, and I wouldn’t want it any other way. I’m thankful everyday for the constant love and support from family, friends, and all of you, but today I’m feeling extra grateful. It’s so important to take time to reflect and appreciate everything you have in your life, from the small things that you take for granted to life’s big moments.

I hope you guys have a warm and loving holiday!♥️ #thanksgiving #happythanksgiving #thanks

Nothing makes me happier than shopping for holiday/resort wear. I always start that shopping list with @modaoperandi .
